alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 10:28PM CDT until June 17 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Russell County in central Kansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1027 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Russell, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russell, Lucas, Gorham, Dorrance, Milberger, Bunker Hill, Wilson Lake and Russell Airport. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 176 and 201. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
